title: Staunch Commitment to Conflict Prevention Key to Tackling Evolving Global Security Needs, Secretary-General Tells General ...
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations ) Keeping pace with the evolving security landscape was a collective responsibility that required a staunch commitment to conflict prevention - through building capacities, investing resources, and above all,
